steps.name: a COVIDCode provider is on the Disease Course section on the Follow Up Form
"Drug Treatments" section should display along with the values "None", "Azithromycin", "Chloroquine", "Corticosteroids", "Hydroxycholoquine", "JAK Inhibitor", "Remdesivir", "Tocilizumab", "Other"
